title: Strange Days
brief_description: In the lead up to the new millennium, Los Angeles is on the brink of anarchy, with crime and racial tensions threatened to explode. Kathryn Bigelow’s groundbreaking sci-fi, neo-noir classic stars Ralph Fiennes as Lenny Nero, a criminal who must solve a friend’s murder.

constellations_other.name: Good vibrations
constellations_other.description: Since its invention, the humble theremin has been used in a number of different ways to evoke all sorts of strange sounds and moods.

constellations_other.name: The perils of new technology
constellations_other.description: Explores our fascination with, and our anxiety surrounding, new technology, which is something that can bring about significant cultural change but also danger.

constellations_other.name: Capturing first-person POV
constellations_other.description: A comparison of how videogames and feature films have used first person POV shots and sequences and how (for the latter) camera technology has impacted on this.

description: Los Angeles. December 29, 1999 - the lead up to the new millennium. The city is close to anarchy, with crime and racial tensions creating an ever present sense of danger. Lenny Nero (Ralph Fiennes) is an ex-cop who now deals in illegal SQUIDS, CD-discs of memory/experiences used like a virtual reality game where the user gets to experience moments recorded from someone’s cerebral cortex. When Lenny’s friend Iris is murdered and he receives a SQUID clip of the incident, he stumbles into a web of killing and police corruption which involves his ex-girlfriend, rock singer Faith Justin (Juliette Lewis) and her gangster manager/lover Philo Gant (Michael Wincott). With help from friends Mace (Angela Bassett) and Max (Tom Sizemore), Lenny tries to find out who is behind the murders whilst not being killed himself. Written by James Cameron in collaboration with former film critic Jay Cocks, “Strange days” has strong performances from Ralph Fiennes and Angela Bassett who have a lot of fun with the role reversals - Lenny is a hopeless hero whilst Mace is the strong, heroic action heroine.
